summary: Versatile Full-Stack and Salesforce Developer with a robust background in crafting CRM workflows, process automations, and backend integrations. Proficient in Apex, API-based logic, and actively transitioning into AI-driven solutions, including LLM integrations and automation engineering. Adept at collaborating across teams and leveraging tools to build scalable, sustainable systems. Currently mastering no-code/low-code platforms to enhance delivery speed and cross-tool synergy.

experience.title: Salesforce Developer
responsibilities: Designed workflow automations with Salesforce Flows, Apex logic, and API integrations, laying the groundwork for AI-enhanced process optimization
Connected Salesforce to third-party systems using REST and SOAP APIs to automate data flows and service triggers
Collaborated with product and service teams to align business logic, user processes, and automation rules
Created Lightning Web Components and configured dashboards to boost usability and stakeholder visibility
Improved CRM segmentation and campaign reporting for luxury brands

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built backend tools and APIs to automate product review data extraction
Built scalable scraping workflows and managed MongoDB and Redis to structure customer sentiment analysis
Supported marketing and product teams by delivering automation-ready datasets and structured feedback loops
Integrated services via AWS and Docker
Participated in frontend logic adjustments to ensure smooth user flow and system alignment
